name: corporate-ftp-infiltration
title: A corporate FTP server has been configured with weak security practices. The system administrator left default credentials and misconfigured anonymous access. Your task is to infiltrate the FTP server and retrieve the confidential document containing sensitive company data.
description: A corporate FTP server has been configured with weak security practices. The system administrator left default credentials and misconfigured anonymous access. Your task is to infiltrate the FTP server and retrieve the confidential document containing sensitive company data.
author: anonymous
